attributes.action: Have a minimum charge for mini cabs in London set at £9.00
attributes.additional_details:
Company owner for four years 
Trade destroyed by venture capitalists investment in cheap attitude company's with no regard for staff or the public
attributes.background: Have been in trade for twenty  years it's now impossible to earn a living and live around the capital all private hire needs to be balanced not price driven

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly. The London Assembly is responsible for setting regulated taxi fares.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
